text: and two bulls, five rams, five he-goats, and five yearling lambs for a communion sacrifice. This was the offering of Shelumiel, son of Zurishaddai.
two columns; two nodes for the capitals on top of the columns; two pieces of netting covering the two nodes for the capitals on top of the columns;
descendants of Pashhur, one thousand two hundred and forty-seven;
“When they who were sent by the king blasphemed, your angel went out and killed a hundred and eighty-five thousand of them.
Last of all, after her sons, the mother was put to death.
“Two people were in debt to a certain creditor; one owed five hundred days’ wages and the other owed fifty.
Others said, “This is the Messiah.” But others said, “The Messiah will not come from Galilee, will he?
So they made a calf in those days, offered sacrifice to the idol, and reveled in the works of their hands.
